desc.cn: Scapy 是一个用 Python 编写的强大的交互式数据包操作库
desc.en: Scapy is a powerful interactive packet manipulation library written in Python

debian/apt.cmd:
sudo apt-get install libpcap-dev \
&& sudo apt install python3-scapy

ubuntu/apt.cmd:
sudo apt-get install libpcap-dev \
&& sudo apt install python3-scapy

fedora/yum.cmd:
sudo yum install libpcap-devel \
&& sudo yum install python3-scapy
